text:
2016 §26; E1-4 §33
302-1 Energy consumption within the ESRS E1 E1-5 §37; §38; §AR 32 (2b) Differences exist between
organization (a), (c), (e) and (f) the two in how energy
(302-1-a, b, c, e and g) consumption data is
aggregated and
disaggregated.
302-2 Energy consumption outside of 'Energy' is a sustainability matter (2b)
the organization for E1 covered by ESRS 1 §AR
16. Hence this GRI disclosure is
covered by MDR-P, MDR-A,
MDR-T, and/or as an entity-
specific metric to be disclosed
